data.actual_result: There's no toast. You get the toast only when you stay in the preview after clicking the download button.
data.expected_result: After the image has downloaded, a toast appears saying that the image was downloaded.
data.short_description: There's no file downloaded toast when you click on the download button in the preview of a image/gif and close the preview.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the image preview of a image. - Click on download and close the image preview.
